name: Valkyrie Junior
description:
Get Down to the Dungeon

Valkyrie Junior finally brings together the thrill of dungeon crawling with the sophistication of a disco beat. Dance past ghosts and other hazards, grab the key and unlock the next high-stepping level.

This game is an entry for DragonRuby Classics Jam: Gauntlet Edition. It is inspired by the classic arcade game "Gauntlet".

Important: this game wants you to WEAR HEADPHONES

Controls:

Arrow keys to move.

Press + or - to control the volume

Press BACKSPACE to restart the game from the beginning.

How to play:

Listen to the hand-clap sound. You can only move 1 time between claps. You MUST move in that time.

If you move onto a cracked square, you will die.

If you stay on the same square too long, you will die.

If you get too close to a ghost, you will die.

Get to the exit without falling through cracks in the floor or being accosted by ghosts.

Grab the key or the exit will stay locked.

Grab the treasure for extra points.

Step onto the bones to destroy them and stop ghosts emerging.

Raised squares are safe. You will never fall through a raised square. Ghosts will never move onto a raised square. Use them to help you on your way.
